name: Pit People®
description: In this fast-paced, turn-based, co-op adventure you'll quest and explore, find awesome loot, customize your fighters, and recruit strange species! Come master your destiny in this strategic game of positioning.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows®  Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz+ or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
